title: Ford Halts Production, Shipments of F-150 Lightning Over Possible Battery Issue
description: The Lightning logo on the side of an all-new Ford F-150 Lightning electric pickup truck outside the Ford Motor World Headquarters in Dearborn, Mich., on April 26, 2022. (Rebecca Cook/Reuters)

title: Cruz Say’s He’s Using ‘Twitter Files’ as ‘Road Map’ to Investigate Other Big Tech Platforms

title: Dystopian Artificial Intelligence Is Not Near, It Is Already Here
